column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]The New Brunswick Post-Graduate Entrepreneurial Stream is for foreign students who have completed a program lasting two years or more at the province’s colleges or universities. Such candidates have already started or purchased a business and have been operating it in this province for over a year while possessing a valid Post-Graduate Work Permit.

To be eligible for the New Brunswick Post-Graduate Entrepreneurial Stream, candidates must have completed a 2-year post-secondary college degree in NB. Also, they must have operated a business in New Brunswick for at least one year.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” color_type=”regular” highlight_color=”#ffc3b7″ style=”half_text”]

Eligibility Requirements

[/nectar_highlighted_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]The minimum eligibility requirements for the New Brunswick Post-Graduate Entrepreneurial Stream are described below:[/vc_column_text][toggles style=”default”][toggle color=”Default” title=”Age”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650808441266{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]The candidate must be between 22 and 34 years of age. Candidates between the age of 22 and 34 will receive more points on their Selection Factors.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Work Experience”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650808476738{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]There are no minimum work experience requirements in this category. However, candidates can get additional Selection Factor Points if they have a minimum of one year of work experience in a role that falls under National Occupation Codes (NOC) 0, A, or B. This work experience does not include their time running their business in this province.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Language Proficiency Requirements”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650808460130{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]Applicants must demonstrate their proficiency in English or French by scoring a minimum of CLB 5 or NCLC 7 on an approved language exam. They can score more points on their Selection Factors if their score is higher.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Education Requirements”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650808526307{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]
  • Candidates must have completed a two-year college or university program in New Brunswick.
  • They must have also resided in New Brunswick while completing their program.
  • This means distance learning programs are not eligible.
  • Candidates can get additional points on their Selection Factors if they have degrees from longer or more advanced programs.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Net Worth”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650807286572{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]Prospective entrepreneurs must have a personal net worth of $600,000 CAD or greater. $300,000 CAD from this net worth must be liquid and available. The net worth amount must also be verifiable.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Business Requirements”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650808562194{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]
  • The candidate’s business must benefit New Brunswick’s economy.
  • The candidate’s business must have also been in operation for a minimum of one year preceding the application.
  • The candidate must possess a 100% ownership share in the company.
  • The applicant must have an active management role and oversee daily operations at the business.
[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Default” title=”Job Creation”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1650808576675{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]The candidate’s business must create one or more full-time positions for Canadian citizens or Canadian permanent residents residing in New Brunswick.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default”   • Research & Preparation
  • Registration
  • Application
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Stage 2″ font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650452476887{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”5px”]

Stage One

[/nectar_highlighted_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”1. Research & Preparation” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650793904378{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Post-graduate applicants must first determine that they meet the eligibility requirements stated above. They must then gather and prepare the documents required for their application.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”2. Registration” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650793884052{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Next, candidates can create their online candidate profile at www.welcomenb.ca. They can then submit their Expression of Interest (EOI) that shows their interest in becoming a Canadian permanent resident through the New Brunswick Provincial Nominee Program. Post-graduate candidates who meet the minimum eligibility requirements will be placed in a pool of candidates.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”3. Application” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650793983892{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Successful entrepreneur applicants will then receive an Invitation to Apply (ITA) and will have 90 days to submit their application through the New Brunswick Online System and pay the associated processing fee.

The PETL will then review the candidate’s application. They may also ask the applicant to attend an interview if they require additional information.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” Application Approval” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650807761473{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]If the PETL approves the application, they will issue the candidate a nomination certificate which is valid for nine months.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”5. Applying for Permanent Residence” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650807797787{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Candidates can then submit their Application for Permanent Residence with Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC). Successful candidates will be issued a Permanent Resident visa that allows them to become Canadian Permanent Residents.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”6. Post-Landing Process” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650807828065{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Entrepreneurs must enter Canada and report to PETL within thirty days of their arrival. They must then continue running their businesses according to the province’s requirements.[/vc_column_text][image_with_animation animation=”Fade In” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”bottom” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” top_padding=”5%” bottom_padding=”5%” left_padding_desktop=”7%” right_padding_desktop=”7%” top_padding_phone=”7%” bottom_padding_phone=”15%” left_padding_phone=”10%” right_padding_phone=”10%” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”1″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”How COLOSSUS can help you?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1650794474861{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Prospective entrepreneurs and business people who wish to apply for the New Brunswick Post-Graduate Entrepreneurial Stream of NBPNP should get in touch with us.
